member.name: IPropertyDescription2.GetImageReferenceForValue
member.summary: Gets the image reference associated with a property value.
member.param: The for which to get an image.
A pointer to a buffer that receives, when this method returns successfully, a string of the form <dll name>,-<resid> that is suitable to be passed to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyDescription2
member.summary: Exposes methods that enumerate and retrieve individual property description details.
